name: Air Fryer Roasted Garlic
author: Yoly
summary: Roasted garlic adds so much flavor to all dishes. Now it's super easy to make in an air fryer. Once roasted, the cloves easily pop out of their paper casings and are soft as butter. Try spreading on crusty bread or crackers, or use for garlic toast.
directions: Preheat the air fryer to 380 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Cut the top off the head of garlic and place on a square piece of aluminum foil
Bring the foil up and around garlic
Pour olive oil on top and season with salt and pepper
Close ends of foil over garlic, creating a pouch
Air fry until garlic is soft, 16 to 20 minutes
Open the foil pouch very carefully, as hot steam will escape
